Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. -- 10.65 Mills Tax Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a ten and sixty five-hundredths (10.65) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $829,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, operating and maintaining garbage disposal areas and garbage collection and disposal equipment in the Parish?
